page.title: 18Farming
page.content: Most of the area is agricultural with the emphasis on Dairy Farming.There are several large dairy farms with Friesian cattle (black and white) being the chief stock.On the western edge of our area is a Milk Marketing A.I. Centre with about 20 bulls.The farmers sell their milk to the Co-op dairy at Fole (3 miles to the east).The crops are mainly silage and hay although some barley is grown. Winnothdale is an area of small holdings some of which are too small to support the family so other work is undertaken (one farmer is also a plumber). The farmers have lost income because of E.E.C. laws(1985) restricting the amount of milk they can produce.
